name: modern deadly stealth shooter
description:
Modern Deadly Stealth Shooter
Modern deadly Stealth shooter is a nice game on the store as it checks your strengths and powers all at same time. The game is designed carefully to offer the great entertainment to users. The game is actually the strategy game and helps you to test your strengths, sharpness and creativity. The game as a whole is a gift for all the strategy game lovers.
How to Play
• Tap to start the game
• Spend some money to remove ads (if you want)
• Select mission level
• Face the enemy with courage
• Kill all enemies without being spotted
• Switch the rifle
• Aim and shoot the enemies
• Complete the mission to enter into next one
Features
• Real 3D Graphics
• Real Missions
• Missions at different Geographic locations
• Learn to control your stress and be passionate
Remember, Modern deadly Stealth shooter is the game that tests your passions and skills at its different levels. So, before playing accept the challenge and then win the game.
